about.title: Planing a trip but don`t know where to go?
about.description: Tripadvancer will help you discover the world in a new way, find interesting places and go on an amazing trip.

file.maxSize: The file size must not exceed {size} MB
file.maxCount: You can upload up to {count} files

text.minLength: This field must be at least {minLength} characters long
text.maxLength: This field must be at most {maxLength} characters long

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

wrong.passwordPolicy: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including a number

title.minLength: The title must be at least {minLength} characters long
title.maxLength: The title must be at most {maxLength} characters long

description.minLength: The description must be at least {minLength} characters long
description.maxLength: The description must be at most {maxLength} characters long

location.invalid: Coordinates must be in format: 'lat, lng', e.g. '50.4501, 30.5234'

categories.required: Please select at least one category
categories.maxCount: You can select up to {maxCount} categories

username.invalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens and dots

location.invalid: Coordinates must be in format: 'lat, lng', e.g. '50.4501, 30.5234'

success.copyCoordinates: Coordinates have been copied to the clipboard.
success.requestPersonalData: Your personal data has been sent to your email.

deletePlace.title: Delete place
deletePlace.text: Are you sure you want to delete this place and all data associated with it? This action is irreversible.

deleteList.title: Delete list
deleteList.text: Are you sure you want to delete this list? This action is irreversible.

requestPersonalData.title: Send personal data
requestPersonalData.text: Are you sure you want to send your personal data to your email?

requestUserDeletion.title: Delete your account
requestUserDeletion.text: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

common.error: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.

emptyMessage.reviews: There are no reviews here at the moment.
emptyMessage.places: There are no places here at the moment.

geolocation.isNotPermission: You have denied access to geolocation. Please enable it in settings.
geolocation.isNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
geolocation.isNotEnabled: Geolocation is not enabled. Please enable it in your browser settings.

cookieConsent.title: Allow Cookies
cookieConsent.text: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. For more information, you can read our <cookiePolicyLink>Cookie Policy</cookiePolicyLink>.

emailVerificationNotice.text: Your email is not <verifiedLink>verified</verifiedLink>. Please confirm you email to get access to all features Tripadvancer.

reasons.copyright: Copyright or intellectual property rights violation

locationPicker.title: Pick place location
locationPicker.toggleMethodOnMap: Select a location on the map

placesNearbyWarning.title: Attention
placesNearbyWarning.text: Sorry, we cannot add a new place here because there are already others nearby, within {radius} meters. If the place you want to add is on the list below, please share your review. If it is not listed, just contact our support team for help.

text.label: Review
text.placeholder: Share your impressions in detail — this way you will help others learn more about this place

sharePlace.title: Share place
sharePlace.text: Share the place with your friends and invite them to visit it.

signInReject.title: Your account is pending deletion
signInReject.text: We have sent you the instructions to restore your account. Please note that there is a limited time window available for account restoration.

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.thirdPartyTitle: Or, sign up with your email address
signUp.info: By completing the registration process, you acknowledge and accept our <termsLink>Terms and Conditions</termsLink> and <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.

signupCompleting.title: Verify your email
signupCompleting.text: We have sent you a verification email. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions provided in the email to complete the verification process.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.info: To reset your password, please enter your email address. We will send an email to the provided address with instructions on how to reset your password:

forgotPasswordCompleting.title: Completing the recovery
forgotPasswordCompleting.text: We sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password.

changeEmail.title: Change email
changeEmail.text: Enter your new email address below and we will send you a verification email:

changeEmailCompleting.title: Confirm your new email
changeEmailCompleting.text: We have sent you a verification email. After confirming your new email address, you will be able to sign in using it.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.text: Create a new password that is at least 8 characters long and contains a mix of letters and numbers:

status.expired: The password reset link has expired. Please request a new password reset link.

claimEmailError.title: Your email is not verified
claimEmailError.text: Verified accounts have more features. Please confirm your email by clicking the link in the email we sent you during registration.

status.expired: The email verification link has expired. Please sign in again so we can send you a new verification link.
The confirmation link has expired. Please request a new confirmation link.
status.ok: The deletion process has been started. This process may take up to several days. You can restore your account using the link sent to your email until the deletion process is finished.

requestUserDeletionCompleting.title: Request account deletion
requestUserDeletionCompleting.text: We have sent you an email with instructions on how to confirm the deletion of your account.

status.expired: The restore link has expired. Please request a new restore link.

error.emailNotProvided: No email provided by social login. Please use another form of login.
error.emailAlreadyExists: Seems like you already have an account with another method. Please use that instead.

error.title: Oops! Something Went Wrong
error.text: We are really sorry, but it seems like there is a hiccup in the digital universe. Our servers are currently experiencing technical difficulties, and we are working diligently to get things back on track.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.text: We are sorry, but it seems you have ventured into uncharted territory. The page you were looking for has either been moved, deleted, or never existed in the first place.

countries.title: Where are you going?
countries.text: Visit top-rated destinations recommended by fellow travelers. Discover must-see sights, from iconic landmarks to hidden gems waiting to be explored.

aroundPlaces.title: Explore places around you
aroundPlaces.text: Discover what interesting places are near you. These locations are recommended by other travelers, and you can visit them today.

map.title: Not enough? Use our map
map.text: If you’re looking for even more options, use our map with attractions to discover interesting places worldwide. Easily plan your travels and share your discoveries with fellow adventurers.

features.title: Our Features
features.text:
Check out our app’s exciting features and connect with a community of like-minded travelers.

Join us today and start your adventure!

featurePlaces.title:
Add your favorite

places
featurePlaces.text: You can add any place to the map yourself. Just a few clicks and your favorite place will be available to all travelers around the world.

featureLists.title:
Create your own

lists of places
featureLists.text: Create, edit, and manage lists of your favorite places. Organize landmarks for easy access during your travels.

featureRandom.title:
Find random

places nearby
featureRandom.text: Can’t decide where to go? Try our random place search! Pick a category, set a distance, and embark on new adventures.

cover.placeholder: Upload the cover (jpg, png up to 10 MB)

about.label: About this place
about.text: Tell us what inspired you so you can help others learn more about this place.

photos.label: Photos
photos.text: You can upload up to {maxCount} photos of the place.

placeForm.terms: By adding a new place to the map, you acknowledge and accept our <termsLink>Terms and Conditions</termsLink> and <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.

visitedCountries.emptyMessage:
You have not visited any countries yet.

To view your visited countries, add a place you have been to.

Learn more

options.show_my_map: Show my visited map to everyone

verifyEmail.title: Your email is not verified
verifyEmail.text: Verified accounts have more features. Please confirm your email by clicking the link in the email we sent you during registration.

changeEmail.title: Email
changeEmail.text: Your email will be used for signing in, receiving notifications and resetting your password.

changePassword.title: Password
changePassword.text: We recommend that you use a password that is different from your other online accounts and change it from time to time.

requestPersonalData.title: Personal Information
requestPersonalData.text: You may request a copy of the personal data we hold about you. This includes any information you provided to us when you registered, such as your username, email address, and other additional details. For more information, please refer to our <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.

requestUserDeletion.title: Account
requestUserDeletion.text: You may request deletion of your account and all data associated with it. You will be able to restore your account using the link sent to your email before the deletion process is completed.

country.description: Discover the best places to visit in {country}, curated by fellow travelers who know it best. Find out the top things to do in {country} based on insider recommendations.
country.emptyPlaces: There are no places yet. Be the first to add a place!

place.author: Author
place.abandonedWarning: Places in the "Abandoned" category might be dangerous, be careful.

rating.average: <reviewsLink>{reviewsCount, plural, =0 {No reviews} =1 {# review} other {# reviews}}</reviewsLink> with an average rating of {avgRating}
rating.empty: This place does not have a rating yet

widget.error:
An unexpected error has occurred.

Please try again later.

search.placeholder: Find a country, place or address

allPlaces.title: All places
allPlaces.emptyMessage:
No places found.

Try changing categories or zooming out the map.

savedPlaces.title: Saved
savedPlaces.emptyMessage:
You have not saved places.

Create a new list and start adding places to it.
savedPlaces.notLoggedIn:
You are not logged in.

Sign in to see saved places.

lists.emptyMessage:
This list is empty.

Add place to this list or try changing categories.
lists.info: Select a list to view saved places.

random.emptyMessage:
No places matcing your filter found.

Try changing categories or radius.
random.notLocation: To find a random place around you, please allow access to your location.
random.info: Select categories, radius around you or a specified point and we will select interesting place for you.
